Name: Portugal
story:
You are in  Lisbon, which is the capital of Portugal.

Upon arriving in Portugal, you began to gather information and track down leads in your pursuit of the thief. You spoke with the locals, scoured the city streets and alleys, and used all your detective skills to try to find clues that would help you locate the elusive criminal. The thief fled to Portugal to escape you, but you're determined and won't be deterred. As you continued your search, you discovered that the thief had been active in Portugal for some time, stealing valuable artifacts and selling them on the black market. You know you need to act quickly before the thief can disappear again and escape capture.
He is not in Portugal, where do you want to go now?
nav: Press 1 to go to Spain, press 2 to go to France or press 3 to go to Belgium

Name: Spain
story:
You are in  Madrid, which is the capital of Spain.

Arriving in Spain, you continued to pursue your thief, following a trail of clues that led him to the outskirts of your city. When approaching a building in the city center you can see the thief.
The thief had a car waiting for him, ready to make a quick getaway.
You knew you had to act fast and started running towards his car, hoping to catch him before he could get away.
But your thief was faster and jumped into the car and accelerated down the road, leaving you behind.
You know you couldn't give up, but you keep chasing his car, determined to bring the thief to justice. The chase continues, but around the first corner through the busy streets of Madrid, you lose sight of him.
Now you believe he must go to another country to hide.
nav: Press 1 to go to Portugal or press 2 to go to Ireland

Name: France
story:
You are in  Paris, which is the capital of France.

When you arrive in Paris, you start looking for the thief who stole the valuable diamond. You gather information and clues, talking to witnesses and studying security footage to try and track down the culprit. However, despite their best efforts, the thief manages to escape on a train.

You are frustrated by the thief's cunning and his ability to evade capture, but you remain determined to bring him to justice. You continue your investigation, following all the leads and using all of his skills and knowledge to track down the thief.

As the case continues, you navigate the complex streets of Paris and use all your resources to stay one step ahead of the thief. Can you catch the criminal and retrieve the stolen painting, or will the thief continue to evade justice? From the information gathered, he is no longer in Paris. Where must he have gone now?
nav: Press 1 to go to Portugal or press 2 to go to Germany

Name: Belgium
story:
You are in  Brussels which is the capital of Belgium.

You quickly jump into a nearby car and follow the taxi the thief is in. You follow the cab for several blocks, but eventually the cab turns onto a side street and you lose sight of it. You then decide to try to track the taxi by looking for it in the city's taxi database. You start looking and end up finding the taxi, but it's too late. The thief had already escaped.

Talking to the local police he must have left and changed parents. Where must he have gone?
nav: Press 1 to go to Portugal or press 2 to go to Luxembourg

Name: Luxembourg
story:
You are in  Luxembourg which is the capital of Luxembourg.

You start looking for clues, visiting local pawn shops and asking around. You eventually discover that the thief has sold a stolen item to a shopkeeper downtown. Visiting the shopkeeper, he manages to get a description of the thief and a rough idea of where he was going.

You follow the trail and end up tracking the thief to a small town on the outskirts of Luxembourg. You set up surveillance outside the thief's supposed hideout and wait, hoping to catch the thief in the act. After 2 days, you finally see the thief leaving the building. You follow the thief but he's fast and you end up losing sight of him again. You have no idea where he might have gone, but he sure has gone far.
nav: Press 1 to go to Belgium, press 2 to go to Austria, press 3 to go to Hungry or 4 to go to Poland

Name: Germany
story:
You are in  Berlin which is the capital of Germany.

You begin your quest by talking to some of the villagers and asking them for any information about the thief. You visit some of the local police stations and speak with detectives who may have done business with the thief in the past. You also visit some of the most dangerous parts of the city in an effort to locate the thief. You finally narrow your search down to a few suspects and start questioning them. After a few weeks of investigation and questioning, no leads were found, apart from the concrete information that he must no longer be in German cities.
nav: Press 1 to go to France, press 2 to go to Italy, press 3 to go to Croatia or 4 to go to Czechia

Name: Ireland
story:
You are in  Dublin which is the capital of Ireland.

As you continue your search for the diamond thief in Dublin, it looks like the thief has managed to escape once again. This is likely to be a frustrating and disappointing outcome for your long career as a detective, who has been working hard to track down the thief and recover the stolen diamond.

To continue the investigation, you will need to reevaluate your approach and consider new strategies and tactics. For example, you can expand your search to include other cities or countries where the thief may have fled, or you can enlist the help of local law enforcement agencies to gather additional information and clues.

Additionally, she may need to continue interviewing potential witnesses and following up on any leads they may have previously gathered, as even the smallest piece of information can provide a crucial clue to the thief's whereabouts. With persistence and determination, you may finally be able to track down the diamond thief and bring him to justice.

Unfortunately he is not here. Where does he want to go now?
nav: Press 1 to go to Spain, press 2 to go to England , press 3 to go to Slovenia or 4 to go to Slovakia

Name: Romania
story:
You are in  Bucharest which is the capital of Romania.

You arrive in the city and follow the thief's car as he drives through the city's winding streets. You notice that the thief is going to the outskirts of the city. As you follow the thief, you notice that the thief's car is slowing down. You accelerate quickly and eventually catch up with the thief's car. You stop beside the car and draw your gun. The thief quickly stops the car and jumps out, fleeing on foot. You chase the thief, but you lose sight of him.

You decide to search the area to try to find the thief. You visit the local stores and ask if anyone has seen the thief. After a few hours of searching, he finally finds a witness who saw the thief fleeing. The witness points in the direction the thief ran and you start following the trail.

You finally find the thief hiding in an old abandoned warehouse. You confront the thief and demand that he return the stolen goods, but the thief refuses. After a slight carelessness, the thief runs out and goes to the back of the warehouse where a motorcycle is waiting for him. Unfortunately you ended up losing the thief once again. How about being faster from now on?

Surely he is no longer here, where must he have gone?
nav: Press 1 to go to Lithuania

Name: Lithuania
story:
You are in  Vilnius which is the capital of Lithuania.

You follow the thief's trail, determined to catch him. You visit local merchants, asking questions and examining leads. You visit old hideouts and contact known associates of the thief. You eventually discover a pattern in the thief's movements, leading you to a small village on the outskirts of town.

You watch the village, waiting for the thief to appear. After four days of waiting, the thief finally appears. You follow him through the village, but the thief is very fast and disappears into the crowd.

You refuse to give up. You search for days, using all the resources at your disposal. Finally, you discover the thief hiding in an abandoned factory on the outskirts of town. You sneak in and face the thief, who is surprised by his persistence.

After an exchange of punches, you fall and hit your head and become unconscious.
When he manages to wake up from the crash, he realizes that the thief is no longer there and he will have to look for clues again.

After these chases you believe that in the next ambush he will be able to catch the thief because he left him very hurt.

And now, where can you go?
nav: Press 1  to go to Romania or press 2 to go to Finland

Name: Finland
story:
You are in  Helsinki which is the capital of Finland.

When you arrive in Finland, you are determined to continue your search for the diamond thief and recover the stolen diamond. After many trips and searches, you finally get a clue as to where the thief might be hiding with the diamonds.

The clue leads you to a small cabin in a remote forested area outside Helsinki. You approach the hut carefully, watching for any sign of the thief. As he gets closer, he hears noises coming from inside the cockpit and knows he is closing in on his target.

You carefully make your way to the cabin and cautiously open the door, ready to face the burglar. You are prepared for whatever comes next, determined to bring the thief to justice and return the diamonds to their rightful owner.

After a short struggle, you manage to apprehend the thief and retrieve the stolen diamonds!

  The thief is taken into custody and the diamond is returned to its rightful owner. You are hailed as a hero for your dedication and determination to track down the thief and recover the stolen diamonds. The case is finally closed and you can rest easy knowing that justice has been served.
nav:
Walking through the city you bump into a builder.

You start talking and he points out to you mountains north of the city that will certainly be able to find clues about the diamond you are looking for.

You follow the tips and arrive in the mountains.

You climb the first valley of the first mountain alone.

Looking in every corner you find a small barrel lying on the ground.

With the help of stones you can open the barrel and find the long-awaited diamond!!!

YOU WON!

nav:
Walking through the city you bump into a traveler.

You start talking and he shows you a path inside the city that could possibly find clues about the diamond you are looking for.

You follow the hints and find a grove.

You enter the woods and there is no one around.

Searching in each corner you find a small underground passage.

With the help of your cell phone's flashlight, you find a leather bag lying on the floor.

You open the bag and find the long-awaited diamond!!!

YOU WON!

nav:
Walking through the city you bump into a merchant.

You start talking and he shows you a path in the center of the city that could possibly find clues about the diamond you are looking for.

You follow the tips and find an old house.

You enter the house, there is no one inside.

Searching in every corner you open a small door inside one of the rooms that leads to a dark basement.

Going down the stairs you don't hear anything.

With the help of your cell phone's flashlight, you find a shoebox lying on the floor.

You open the box and find the long awaited diamond!!!

YOU WON!
